results.title: Billionaire No More: Patagonia Founder Gives Away the Company

results.byline: By Kate Conger and Kevin Roose
results.title: Uber Investigating Breach of Its Computer Systems
results.abstract: The company said on Thursday that it was looking into the scope of the apparent hack.

media.caption: A message on Uber’s internal system on Thursday told employees, “I announce I am a hacker and Uber has suffered a data breach.”

results.title: Social Security’s Cost-of-Living Increase Will Be Largest in Four Decades, an Estimate Says
results.abstract: Retirees will learn the amount of the increase for 2023 in October, and the current estimate is that it will be 8.7%.

media.caption: More than 70 million people — including retirees, those receiving disability and very low-income Americans — will be affected by the benefit increase.

results.title: ‘Phantom of the Opera,’ Broadway’s Longest-Running Show, to Close
results.abstract: The theatergoing audience has been slow to return after the pandemic lockdown, and the show hasn’t been selling well enough to defray its running costs.

media.caption: Emilie Kouatchou and Ben Crawford lead the current cast of “The Phantom of the Opera” on Broadway.
